CustomField.description: used by Hubspot for routing & assignment
CustomField.formula:
!IsBlank (Owner:Queue.Id)
/* How do I know if a case owner is queue or user?
The system will auto-generate two fields â€“ Owner (Group/Queue) and Owner (User). If the owner is a queue, the Owner (Group/Queue) Id will have the queue Id and the Owner (User) Id will stay null. If the owner is a user then vice versa.
*/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: used by Hubspot for routing & assignment
CustomField.label: Owned by a Queue
